text: Anika Noni Rose (born September 6, 1972) is an American singer and actress. She is best known for her Tony Award-winning role in the Broadway production of Caroline, or Change. She is also known for her starring roles in movies such as Dreamgirls (2006), The Princess and the Frog (2009) and For Colored Girls (2010). Rose was born in Bloomfield, Connecticut. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:African-American actors Category:Singers from Connecticut Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American sopranos Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:People from Bloomfield, Connecticut
title: Anika Noni Rose
